Clip.name: actor
Clip.desc: An actor, e.g. in tv, radio, movie, video games etc., or in an event. Actors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

Clip.name: partOfSeries
Clip.desc: The series to which this episode or season belongs.

Clip.name: partOfEpisode
Clip.desc: The episode to which this clip belongs.

Clip.name: partOfSeason
Clip.desc: The season to which this episode belongs.

Clip.name: directors
Clip.desc: A director of e.g. tv, radio, movie, video games etc. content. Directors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

Clip.name: director
Clip.desc: A director of e.g. tv, radio, movie, video gaming etc. content, or of an event. Directors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

Clip.name: actors
Clip.desc: An actor, e.g. in tv, radio, movie, video games etc. Actors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

Clip.name: clipNumber
Clip.desc: Position of the clip within an ordered group of clips.
